snippet.title: Jerma's Big Adventure 2 | Official Game Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2227100/Jermas_Big_Adventure_2/
Wishlists help support the game!!
Now targeted for release in Spring 2024  (delay andy)


Become renowned funny-man live streamer @Jerma985  in this free , upcoming, wacky, genre-jumping adventure!
It is up to you to appease the restless live chat audience and climb your way up to internet-clown fame!
Hop between multiple in-universe video games—including snippets from the RPG "Paper Jerma" and the psychological horror game "Peep the Horror"—to quench the ravenous hunger of the chat.

Official game discord server (not much to do, but you can check the game's progress!): https://discord.gg/bBAcMFRGDF

Huge shoutouts to @EchoLane-Music  for the fantastic breakcore remix in this trailer of songs that will appear as part of the OST in the game!!

The original songs that are remixed include work from @savestatecorrupted.  @quiteadept , and@evennesseffectorb3190 !

Also, in a tribute to the first game, Kevin MacLeod's royalty free track "Lightless Dawn" was used!
Lightless Dawn Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

The game's still under development, but I'm planning for a release sometime in 2023! It'll be a short but very dense linear adventure. You can check out the first game for free on Steam (the "plot" of the first game doesn't really matter): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1722570/

Check out the full team credits here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N7t4d5BpeFa2xqKMKb8sgBA0rI657RSjiaBV_veY_xc/edit?usp=sharing

Here's other (social media, etc.) links for me: https://linktr.ee/worblir


Disclaimer: This game is unaffiliated with Jerma985, was not commissioned by him, and does not represent his views. This is a completely free fan-project made for fun by fans.
